price: O gün, zalim kimse (pişmanlıktan) ellerini ısırıp şöyle der: Keşke o peygamberle birlikte bir yol tutsaydım!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
